riskdata-desc: Store [[Special:RiskDataTables|tabular data]] in the database and use them on the same or on other pages
riskdata-error-expensive-function: Too many expensive functions used on this page.
riskdata-error-multiple-records: WHERE clause "$2" on table "$1" selects $3 records.
riskdata-error-no-meta: No metadata found for table "$1". This probably indicates a bug in the [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Extension:RiskData|RiskData]] extension.
riskdata-error-sql-identifier: Illegal SQL identifier "$1". If you need this, ask your wiki administrator to add this to the global variable <tt>$wgRiskDataSqlWhiteList</tt> in <tt>LocalSettings.php</tt>.
riskdata-error-too-few-args: Only $2 arguments provided for parser function "$1" while at least $3 are required.
riskdata-error-too-many-columns: Row "$1" contains $2 columns while at most $3 are allowed.
riskdata-error-unterminated-tag:
Opening <$1> tag without closing </$1> tag in 
$2
.
riskdatadata-summary: This special page shows all data defined for the specified table (and page, if specified) using the [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Extension:RiskData|RiskData]] extension. See [[Special:RiskDataTables]] for a list of tables.
riskdatapages-summary: This special page shows all pages defining data for the specified table using the [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Extension:RiskData|RiskData]] extension. For each page, you may click on "''nn'' records" to see the records. See [[Special:RiskDataTables]] for a list of tables.
riskdatatables-summary: This special page shows all tables defined using the [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Extension:RiskData|RiskData]] extension. For each table, you may click on "''nn'' pages" to see the list of pages defining the data, and on "''nn'' records" to see the records.
